tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE sales_representatives (
  id UUID,
  name TEXT,
  region TEXT,
  commission_rate DECIMAL(5, 2),
  PRIMARY KEY (id)
)

CREATE TABLE customer_visits (
    visit_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    representative_id UUID REFERENCES sales_representatives(representative_id),
    customer_id UUID,
    visit_date DATE,
    feedback TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE visits (
    visit_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    rep_id INT,
    customer_id INT,
    visit_date DATE,
    visit_purpose TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE feedback (
    feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    visit_id INT,
    rep_id INT,
    customer_id INT,
    feedback_details TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE sales (
    sale_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    rep_id INT,
    customer_id INT,
    sale_amount DECIMAL,
    sale_date DATE
);
